title: Sharp Aquos R7 packs a massive 1-inch 47MP sensor, a 240Hz display, and Snapdragon 8 Gen 1
content:
Sharp may not be a household name in the smartphone world, but the company sure knows how to make standout phones with exciting hardware. The Sharp Aquos R6, the company’s last flagship, was one of the first smartphones to pack a massive 1-inch camera sensor and offered seriously impressive hardware, including a 240Hz high refresh

The post Sharp Aquos R7 packs a massive 1-inch 47MP sensor, a 240Hz display, and Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 appeared first on XDA.
